abstract: PepsiCo’s offer of $6 billion to buy back the bottling companies it sold in the late 1990s is a smart move in light of changes in its business.
snippet: PepsiCo’s offer of $6 billion to buy back the bottling companies it sold in the late 1990s is a smart move in light of changes in its business.
lead_paragraph: PepsiCo’s game of spin the bottler has come full circle. The beverage giant has offered $6 billion to buy back the bottling companies it spun off in the late 1990s.

headline.main: A PepsiCo Deal Comes Full Circle
headline.print_headline: A PepsiCo Deal Comes Full Circle
